title: Paul Walter Hauser 🙏🤣
description:
Paul Walter Hauser (Richard Jewell, I, Tonya) talks with Justin about navigating Hollywood while maintaining his Christian values and they reflect on the time Sam Rockwell set them up on their first man-date. 


Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Grove Collaborative - For a limited time, when our listeners go to Grove.CO/LONG you’ll get a FREE FIVE PIECE Cleaning Set from Mrs. Meyer’s and Grove - a $30 value!
